Name: La Dolce Vita
Ingredients: Top up with Fiol Extra Dry Prosecco
Instructions: MUDDLE grapes in base of shaker. Add vodka, honey and bitters, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. TOP with prosecco.
Review: Complex, yet easy to quaff, with a touch of fizz adding some sparkle.
History: Created in 2002 by Tony Conigliaro at Isola, London, England
